thread.title: Bill Murray's Netflix Christmas Special Gets Trailer, Release Date
thread.title_full: Bill Murray's Netflix Christmas Special Gets Trailer, Release Date

title: Bill Murray's Netflix Christmas Special Gets Trailer, Release Date
text:
Bill Murray's Netflix Christmas Special Gets Trailer, Release Date 
Maane Khatchatourian, Variety.com Wednesday, October 14, 2015 11:45 AM EDT | Updated: Wednesday, October 14, 2015 12:12 PM EDT Bill Murray and celebrity friends in a clip from the trailer for his Netflix Christmas special. (YouTube) Bill Murray Christmas special headed to Netflix 
LOS ANGELES - Bill Murray and his celebrity friends, including George Clooney, Miley Cyrus and Amy Poehler, are merry in the first trailer for Murray's Netflix Christmas special. 
"A Very Murray Christmas," which debuts on Netflix on Dec. 4, pays homage to classic holiday variety shows. Murray plays himself -- an actor worried that no one will show up to his TV show due to a snow storm in New York City. 
"Tonight will go down as the greatest night in history," Murray says in the teaser. 
The star-studded cast also includes Chris Rock, Michael Cera, Maya Rudolph, Rashida Jones, Jason Schwartzman, Dimitri Dimitrov, Julie White, David Johansen, Jenny Lewis, Frederic Moulin, Paul Shaffer and the band Phoenix. 
Written by Sofia Coppola, Bill Murray and Mitch Glazer and directed by Coppola, "A Very Murray Christmas" is exec produced by Coppola, Glazer, Roman Coppola and Tony Hernandez. Sponsored Links
